sections.heading: Prevention and Treatment Act, how cited
sections.text: Sections 71-2485 to 71-2495 shall be known and may be cited as the Opioid Prevention and Treatment Act.SourceLaws 2020, LB1124, ยง 1;Laws 2024, LB1355, ยง 4.
